hasAnnotation._instruction: Add the atlas annotation which this parcellation entity version defines.

hasParent._instruction: Add the defined anatomical parent structure (version) for this parcellation entity version, or several if required.

name._instruction: If necessary, enter a version specific name for this parcellation entity version. If left blank, the parcellation entity version will inherit the 'name' of it's corresponding parcellation entity.

ontologyIdentifier._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) pointing to the ontological term matching this parcellation entity version.

relationAssessment._instruction: Add one or several relations of this parcellation entity version to parcellation entity versions of other parcellation terminology versions.

versionIdentifier._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this parcellation entity version.

versionInnovation._instruction: Enter a short description of the novelties/peculiarities of this parcellation entity version.
